original:
Once upon a time in a bustling office, there was a diligent worker named Mark. He showed up every day, focused and dedicated. However, something peculiar occurred one morning that sent his world into a frenzy. Someone took his stapler.
Mark had used his trusty stapler for years. It had seen him through countless reports, presentations, and memos. Now, it was mysteriously gone. His desk felt empty

Mark had used his trusty stapler for years. It had seen him through countless reports, presentations, and memos. Now, it came mysteriously gone. His desk felt empty
